about.title: WHY US?
about.text: At Bun'deal, we don't compromise between taste, quality and commitment. Our promise: fresh, homemade cuisine with local, quality ingredients. Every bun, every filling, every sauce is carefully prepared in our kitchen from raw products sourced from local producers selected for their know-how and respect for the land. By choosing Bun'deal, you support a company that acts concretely for the development of our terroir and region. You encourage a more responsible, more human and more flavorful economy. Bun'deal is much more than a meal: it's a winning deal between you, the planet, and our producers.

legacy.title: Our Heritage
legacy.text1: At Bun'Deal, every recipe tells a story. That of our terroir, our passionate producers, and our desire to make things simple, good and responsible.
legacy.text2: Our heritage is that of home-made cuisine, without compromising on quality. Our ingredients come from local sources, our buns are prepared with care, and our sauces are all home-made.
legacy.text3: More than a fast-food, we want to be a bridge between authenticity and modernity, between producers and customers. Together, let's build a more human and tastier food system.

team.title: Our Team
team.description:
The Bun'Deal team: A shared passion, a unique taste
At Bun'Deal, our strength is our united team, complementary and driven by the love of good products. Behind every burger, every recipe and every smile, there are them üëá:

üçî Takeshi ‚Äì Head chef & grill master
Former chef in a Franco-Japanese fusion bistro, Takeshi combines technique, rigor and creativity. He is the guarantor of perfect cooking and careful presentation. He creates home recipes and perfects sauces like a taste alchemist.

üçû Elena ‚Äì Latest recruit for dining room service
Globe-trotter turned convinced locavore. Enthusiastic and committed, she puts her sense of contact and passion for local at the service of customers. Curious and always smiling, she ensures that every dining experience is as warm as it is responsible. Her credo: "good for you, good for the planet."

üí¨ Aminata ‚Äì Community Manager & weaves partnerships with trusted producers in the region.
Always smiling and listening, Aminata is the voice of Bun'Deal on social networks and in your mailboxes. She also manages events and customer feedback with energy. She creates real connections. "At Bun'Deal, every customer is a guest."

üì¶ Malik ‚Äì Logistics & online orders
Organized like a Swiss watchmaker, Malik ensures that every order leaves on time and arrives hot. He coordinates deliveries, optimizes stocks and manages the website. His mantra: "Zero bugs, zero delays, zero compromises."

üí¨ Our common credo?
Authenticity, transparency, commitment.
At Bun'Deal, we don't just sell burgers, we share values.

testimonials.title: What our customers say about us
testimonials.review1: The burgers are incredible! The bun is soft, the meat is juicy and the homemade sauce... delicious!
testimonials.review2: Fast delivery and super hot on arrival. The fries are crispy, nothing to complain about.
testimonials.review3: The kids menu is perfect for my little ones. They love it and so do I! And the toy is so cute.
